title: Print, "Moon of the Frosty Night (Shimoyo no Tsuki), No. 38", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: Moon of the Frosty Night
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 38 / Shimoyo no Tsuki.
description: A large iris, outer perianth leaves white; inner leaves with green tints.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Moon of the Frosty Night (Shimoyo no Tsuki), No. 38", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.8 x 27.9 cm (16 1/16 in. x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-91.
